text: Sε yεrekenkan Yεn Nsεm pefee no kyerε wͻn a, wobehunu no wͻ wͻn a wͻ’nnye nnie no anim sε wͻ’mpε, aka kakraabi sε wato ahyε wͻn a wͻ’rekenkan Yεn Nsεm kyerε wͻn no so. (Nkͻmhyεni), kasε: “Menkyerε mo deε εyε bͻne kyεn woi?” Amanehunu gya no a Nyankopͻn ahyε ho bͻ akyerε wͻn a woyi boniayε no. (Saa bea no) yε nkyi bͻne paa
